ISSUE.TITLE: Event stream response appears not to work

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix typos in Readme.md (#20) * Fix more typos in Readme.md * `\` -> `|`

feat(now-static-build): add a `distDir` option (#20) Adds an optional `distDir` config option to now-static-build. To be used in `now.json` like ```json { "builds": [ { "src": "package.json", "use": "@now/static-build", "config": { "distDir": "www" } } ] } ``` Closes #19
